name: Oh Deer! Runner
description:
Canary is a reindeer who has always dreamed of pulling Santa's sleigh. Santa rejected him saying he was not strong enough to be part of his team. Now Canary is determined to train hard and become strong enough to pull Santa's sleigh! Music is by: Rc Studios, and Omni_Slim on Instagram.

Note: if you suddenly come to a complete stop just jump a few times, and that should get you back into the action!
